action.description: The committee on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Amato, Chun, Olds; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Marten, Takenouchi, Alcos, Garcia.
